articles.description: Tottenham are moving towards appointing Brentford boss Thomas Frank as their new head coach following the sacking of Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Tottenham close in on Thomas Frank as their next head coach

articles.description: Watch live BBC Scotland coverage and in-play clips, listen to radio commentary, and follow text updates as Scotland face Liechtenstein in a friendly.
articles.title: Liechtenstein vs Scotland: International friendly LIVE - BBC Sport - watch, listen, updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Manchester City complete the signing of Wolves left-back Rayan Ait-Nouri for £31m.
articles.title: Rayan Ait-Nouri: Manchester City sign Algerian defender from Wolves for £31m

articles.description: Britain's Sonay Kartal secures the biggest win of her career as women's tennis returns to Queen's Club for the first time since 1973.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Sonay Kartal beats Daria Kasatkina as Queen's hosts women's tournament for first time in half a century

articles.description: After Women's Super League average attendances dropped by 10% last season, BBC Sport has taken a closer look at what might be behind the numbers.
articles.title: WSL attendances: What's going on with falling numbers in 2024-25?

articles.description: Cristian Chivu leaves Parma after only 13 games in charge to replace Simone Inzaghi as Inter Milan manager.
articles.title: Christian Chivu: Inter appoint Parma manager

articles.description: Andy Murray is open to a return to coaching "at some stage" but says he still has plenty to learn after his stint with Novak Djokovic.
articles.title: Andy Murray open to coaching return 'at some stage'

articles.description: Scotland and Glasgow prop Zander Fagerson is ruled out of the British and Irish Lions' tour to Australia with a calf injury.
articles.title: Zander Fagerson: Scotland prop ruled out of British & Irish Lions tour

articles.description: Portugal striker and captain Cristiano Ronaldo seems set to extend his stay with Saudi Arabian club Al-Nassr
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal striker looks set to extend Al-Nassr stay

articles.description: There are few, if any, tougher more uncompromising tests than Oakmont Country Club, the home of this week's US Open, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: US Open: Oakmont's fast greens, deep rough and penal bunkers make it golf's toughest test
